sect1.title: Providing Feedback
sect1.para: Your feedback and contribution to this documentation is welcome! Several channels are available:

listitem.para: For services and support options available for your product, refer to .
To open a service request, you need a subscription at &scc;. Go to , log in, and click Create New.

To report documentation bugs in
, use the links next to each headline in the HTML version of this document. Report Documentation Bug opens Bugzilla, preselects the right product version and category, and adds a link to the specific section. You can start typing your bug report right away. (A Bugzilla account is required).

Alternatively, you can report errors or send feedback on the documentation by mail to doc-team@suse.com. Make sure to include the document title, the product version and the publication date of the documentation. Refer to the respective section number and title (or include the URL) and provide a concise description of the problem.

To contribute to this documentation, use the Edit Source links next to each headline in the HTML version of this document. They take you to the source code on GitHub, where you can open a pull request. (A GitHub account is required).
